title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 300-2.13 - Introduction or removal of personal property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 300-2.13 - Introduction or removal of personal property

State Regulations

No State-owned or leased personal property shall be
removed from State property or any State facility without authorization from
the appropriate tenant agency. The commissioner reserves the right to inspect
any personal property being brought into or removed from a facility or State
property. The commissioner reserves the right to prohibit the introduction or
removal of personal property upon due cause. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
300-2.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
